subject: Baseball
Ratings (Audience Measurement)
World Series
lead_paragraph: As Bud Selig prepared to preside over his final World Series game as commissioner on Wednesday, he maintained that baseball was in a healthy state despite the critics who focus on the national television ratings.
snippet: As Bud Selig prepared to preside over his final World Series game as commissioner on Wednesday, he maintained that baseball was in a healthy state despite the critics who focus on the national television ratings.
